definition: to be fond of/to have a tendency to/to be prone to
good/well/proper/good to/easy to/very/so/(suffix indicating completion or readiness)/(of two people) close/on intimate terms/(after a personal pronoun) hello
easy/amiable/to change/to exchange/prefix corresponding to the English adjective suffix "-able" or "-ible"
surname Yi/abbr. for 易經|易经[Yi4 jing1], the Book of Changes

sentences.english: Soup shallow Zhu Shi's cheeks with difficulty appears one silk blood-red color.
sentences.chinese: 汤浅朱实的脸颊好不容易才出现一丝血色。

sentences.english: He swam across the river with difficulty.
I managed to persuade quite a few people to see me, and I must keep the appointments.
sentences.chinese: 我好不容易说服了那么多人和我会面，我必须守约呀。

sentences.english: Cook until after midnight, I very not easy to fall asleep.
sentences.chinese: 熬到下半夜，我好不容易才睡着了。

sentences.english: A car whined in protest, but skidded staunchly out of its driveway.
sentences.chinese: 有辆小汽车呜隆隆响着，好不容易蹒跚驶出马路。

sentences.english: I am very not easy to long to piece of white batt.
sentences.chinese: 我好不容易长到了一块白色的棉絮。

sentences.english: His laughter spent, he spoke again.
sentences.chinese: 好不容易笑完了，他又开口说话了。

sentences.english: Very not easy walk to macau Paul's cathedral, must remember to take pictures souvenir.
sentences.chinese: 好不容易走到澳门大三巴牌坊，一定要记得拍照留念。

sentences.english: Is quite not cozy to secretly slip away out today.
sentences.chinese: 今天好不容易偷偷溜出来了。

sentences.english: We barely got out of there and were sent then to the medical unit.
sentences.chinese: 好不容易离开那里之后我们被送到了卫生队。

sentences.english: He just managed to pass the examination.
sentences.chinese: 他好不容易才考试及格。

sentences.english: His tall, lanky body barely fit into the narrow seat.
sentences.chinese: 他高瘦的身躯好不容易折进狭窄的座椅中。

sentences.english: He wormed his way through the narrow passage.
sentences.chinese: 他好不容易才走过那条狭窄的小路。

sentences.english: They had to ask, very not easy to find a safe place.
sentences.chinese: 他们只好四处打听，好不容易才找到一个安身之处。

sentences.english: I could only get out by fighting through the crowd.
sentences.chinese: 我好不容易才从人群中挤了出来。

sentences.english: Shenyang Since Mr. Bi's here, please give me a chance to try. I can sing, too.
sentences.chinese: 毕老师好不容易来一回，让我展现一下，我也会唱。

definition: (idiomatic usage) with great difficulty/to have a hard time (convincing sb, relinquishing sth etc)/(literal usage) so easy
to suffer untold hardships (idiom); trials and tribulations/with difficulty/after some effort
half of the day/a long time/quite a while/midair/CL:個|个[ge4]

pinyin: jiu3 niu2 er4 hu3 zhi1 li4

definition: to do with difficulty/to force sb to do sth/reluctant/barely enough
to wait until/by the time when (sth is ready etc)
